author: GideonSeattle
title: excellent
text:
Met our son &family in NYC; had 3 bedrooms, plus a living room, for the 6 of us.
Stay was excellent.
Andrew Archibald (front desk) did a great job with complicated room rearrangement; was always available &courteous.
Maid service was great, morning &night, esp. Chandra.
Concierge did a great job; booked a restaurant (for 2 adults) at the last moment. Took care of a lost pair of eyeglasses, 'phoned to make sure it got back to us.
Great restaurants. Liked the Japanese breakfast.
Room service service was very good; food not as good as restaurants.
Fini (facial at SPA) is excellent; my wife recommends highly.
Bell desk was very good, Also doormen (taxi w/2 toddlers &stroller can be an issue).
Hotel car to/from airports is very good; not free.
Between the Mandarins in Paris, Munich, and NYC, this is the best.
Room Tip: check the geometry. Try to get Central Park view; if not, Hudson. See more room tips
